Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Provides a period of probable usefulness for broadband and related telecommunications infrastructure
Summary: Provides a 10 year period of probable usefulness for broadband and related telecommunications infrastructure.
LawCode: Amd ยง11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to providing a period of probable usefulness for broadband and related telecommunications infrastructure
